backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature changes, affected files, related components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing short descriptions of major frontend source files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, theming, and global element styles for both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling the proposal flow with animated hearts, evasive 'No' button, and celebratory letter reveal.
frontend/src/components/LetterModal.tsx: Modal component displaying the full letter inside a scrollable, styled dialog.
frontend/src/content/valentineLetter.ts: Exports the full romantic letter text as a template string.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Hook that computes random safe positions for the evasive button and exposes pointer handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider for managing login state and identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, color variables for light/dark themes, global typography, background styling, and custom float animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color tokens linked to CSS variables, plugins, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current feature set and requirements for a romantic Valentine proposal UI, including behavior, theme, and UX expectations.
